newsitem.title: MEXICO: Tribasa wins 100 mln peso road contract.
newsitem.headline: Tribasa wins 100 mln peso road contract.

text.p: Mexican construction firm Grupo Tribasa has won a contract worth 100 million pesos to extend a highway between Mexico City and Queretaro, the firm said on Wednesday.
"The cost of the project is close to 100 million pesos and we plan to begin work on August 15 and to finish on October 31 this year," a Tribasa statement said.
Tribasa said it would sign the contract with the Mexican Government's Toll Highway and Bridges department (Capufe), which would cover the costs.
